document_data.name: Kanishta
document_data.mainbody: '''''Kanishta''''' was a root found in the [[Cold Lands]], specifically [[Narfell]].{{cite book/The Fall of Highwatch/MMP|129}}
document_data.Uses: Though extremely bitter tasting, when chewed this root helped alleviate the effects of exposure to the cold weather of [[northeast Faer√ªn]], infusing strength and warmth into the user.
